name: Light Out - Curly Molly
description:
Amusing lambs ran away from the harmful shepherd and decided to have a blast. They started cheerfully to spend time. They should roll on a grass, sunbathe on the sun and to run across the field like mad. And you have to them help with it, differently the shepherd will catch nothing suspecting fur small animals. But time on an outcome and every second the angry shepherd is coming closer and closer.

This fascinating puzzle will force to plunge into reason halls for a long time. Thus, fans of thoughtful logical tasks and those who needs to pass away carefree time on a trip or turn will be happy. It is promoted by 6 levels of complexity where on the first everything is simple and obvious, and on every next level it is already required less time for passing.

Game represents a puzzle. By pressing the picture, turn over the chosen cage and one cage from four parties. Repeated pressing on this cage cancels action. Purpose: correctly to collect all picture.

After passing of each level the amusing picture with a plot about adventures of an unruly lamb of Molly and its friends is opened. If all 6 levels are passed, the player will be able to look at the small amusing comic book. In the game the time is recorded, therefore the most impressive results are published in Game Center. Compete with friends!

How to play:
Pressing cages on the screen, rotate them so that to collect the picture. Together with the chosen cage turn over on one cage from four parties. By repeated pressing they turn over back.
